\documentclass[screen,8pt]{beamer}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[latin1]{inputenc}
\usetheme{statoil}
\usepackage{amsmath,amssymb,amsfonts}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage[tight]{subfigure}
\usepackage{caption3}
\usepackage{verbatim}



%% Well summary plot.
%%
%% Arguments:
%%
%% 1. Well name.
\newcommand{\WellSummaryPlot}[1]
{
  \begin{frame}
  \frametitle{Well #1}
  \centering
  \begin{figure}
  \subfigure[OPR]{
    \includegraphics[width=0.2\textwidth]{plots/WOPR:#1.png}
  }
  \subfigure[OPT]{
    \includegraphics[width=0.2\textwidth]{plots/WOPT:#1.png}
  }
  \\
  \subfigure[GOR]{
    \includegraphics[width=0.2\textwidth]{plots/WGOR:#1.png}
  }
  \subfigure[WCT]{
    \includegraphics[width=0.2\textwidth]{plots/WWCT:#1.png}
  }
  \caption{Well #1}
  \end{figure}
  \end{frame}
}

\begin{document}

\begin{frame}
\frametitle{Drilled wells}
Well1 well2
\end{frame}

\WellSummaryPlot{OP-1}
